segments.text: Well , if it isn't the teacher's pet !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Stop it . Teacher doesn't treat me any different than she does everyone else .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can't prove that by me . I saw the score on your report .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hey , I worked hard on that report and I deserve the grade I got .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It just happened to be the highest grade in the class .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're just jealous because you didn't do as well as you thought you did . Admit it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I worked hard too . But she always gives me a lower grade .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you think that she is not fair with your work then you should talk to her in person instead of stewing over it .
segments.speaker: S2
